title: Bu bizə harda lazım olacaq?
organization: BHOS Math Club (Baku Higher Oil School)
description: Awarded 3rd place in the mathematics competition titled 'Bu bizə harda lazım olacaq?' (Where will we need this?), organized by the Baku Higher Oil School (BHOS) Mathematics Club. The competition tested students' ability to apply theoretical mathematical concepts to practical, real-world scenarios and complex problem-solving challenges.
